title: UK plans curb on freeholders blocking broadband cabling in flats
description: Building owners would no longer be able to ‘unreasonably refuse’ upgrade requests from leaseholders
content: Building owners would no longer be able to ‘unreasonably refuse’ upgrade requests from leaseholders
